title: Search API Database
name: Drupal-7:SearchApiDb
description: Search backed with the database (and not Solr) can cause performance impacts to your site. Often the SQL queries caused but using the database are slow.
success: Search is not using the database.
failure: Search is using the database. Currently `{{nodes_in_search}}` nodes in `{{number_of_db_indexes}}` database index{{plural_index}}.
warning: Search is using the database. Currently `{{nodes_in_search}}` nodes in `{{number_of_db_indexes}}` database index{{plural_index}}.
remediation: Disable `search_api_db` and then configure search to use Solr.
